# Hunter Web Apps

> Custom software development and strategic consulting for 3PL logistics providers.

## What We Do
- Strategic assessments to identify operational bottlenecks and margin opportunities
- Custom cloud software development for warehouse and logistics operations
- Third-party integrations (EDI, FedEx, ArcGIS, ERP systems)
- Automation solutions tailored to logistics workflows
- Barcode and RFID tracking systems
- Inventory management solutions
- Order processing and shipping logistics
- Warehouse management systems (WMS)
- Operational analytics and reporting

## Who We Serve
- Independent 3PL (third-party logistics) providers
- Supply chain and warehousing companies
- Logistics businesses seeking custom technology solutions
- Growth-minded logistics operations looking to scale throughput

## Technology Expertise
- Custom software development (cloud-native, full-stack)
- Process automation and workflow optimization
- IoT integration for warehouse and fleet tracking
- AI-powered logistics optimization
- System integrations and API development

## Engagement Models

### Path 1: Transformation Journey
1. **Discovery Call** (FREE) - 30-minute call to explore fit and identify quick wins
2. **Strategy Assessment** ($3K-$5K) - 1-week deep dive with workflow analysis, technology gap assessment, and prioritized roadmap
3. **Phased Implementation** ($30K-$50K per phase) - Custom development with parallel testing, training, and 1-year bug-free guarantee

### Path 2: Direct to Solution
- Custom pricing for specific integrations, emergency fixes, scaling, or migrations
- For teams who already know exactly what they need

## Differentiators
- Exclusively focused on independent 3PLs
- APICS CSCP Certified (Certified Supply Chain Professional)
- ASCM Member (Association for Supply Chain Management)
- Partnership mindset - success tied to client KPIs
- 1-year bug-free guarantee on all implementations

## Contact
- Website: https://hunterwebapps.dev
- Email: hunter@hunterwebapps.com
- Phone: (407) 349-3633
- LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/hunterwebapps/
- Location: Serving clients across the United States

## Core Philosophy: A Measured Approach
1. **Progressive Enhancement** - Iterative improvements without waiting for full overhauls
2. **Built-In Guardrails** - New workflows run in parallel with safety fallbacks
3. **Quantified Returns** - Financial and operational metrics tracked phase-by-phase
